1378450.name: RPG Maker MZ - Heroine Character Pack 4
1378450.description:
Heroine Character Pack 4 contains 8 girl characters in school uniform, as well as an extra clothing variation for each girl, including dress, gaucho, kimono, karate and more! It's up to you to decide just what role they're going to play. With matching Walking Sprites, Side-View animated Battlers, static Battlers, Facesets and Bust-Up images with emotions, you'll be able to choose if these heroines will be the party leaders or simply flesh out your world as NPCs.

FEATURES:

* 8 characters in school uniform and an extra fun outfit each (dress, kimono, magician, karate etc) with
* Matching enemies with multipe outfit variations
* Walking character Sprites: 8 characters x 2 outfits = 16 spritess
* Side-View animated Battlers: 8 x 2 outfits = 16 graphics
* Facesets: 8 x 8 emotions x 2 outfits = 128 graphics
* Bust-Up images: 8 x 8 emotions x 2 outfits = 128 graphics
* BONUS: Large-scale full-character graphic: 8 x 2 outfits = 16 graphics (3600 x 4800 pixel size)
* Compatible with RPG Maker MV and MZ
* For use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel games or the engine of your choice!
1378450.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
